mapper.select: SELECT account_id, user_id, account_number, account_name, balance, bank_code, created_at, updated_at FROM accounts WHERE account_number=#{accountNumber} AND bank_code=#{bankCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions( account_id, status, send_bank_code, transaction_amount, created_time, deposit_withdrawal, payee_account_number, account_holder_name ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{status}, #{sendBankCode}, #{transactionAmount}, #{createdTime}, #{depositWithdrawal}, #{payeeAccountNumber}, #{accountHolderName} )
